properties.address: Sennen Churchtown Hall, Penzance, Cornwall TR19 7AD
properties.description: Come and join us every "Souper Wednesday" for free soup, roll, cake, tea and coffee at our small Community Hall. A warm space with lots of friendly people and sociable chat! All welcome! The Hall has Charitable status and is run by a Committee of Trustees. It is situated near to the church, in the village of Sennen, near Penzance, Cornwall. The Hall is near to the beautiful Sennen Cove and just a mile from Land's End. It is situated within a large Community field. The Hall is for hire and can house 80 people.
properties.title: Sennen Churchtown Hall

properties.address: Centre of Pendeen, Church Road, Pendeen, Penzance, TR19 7SE
properties.description: Address: Centre of Pendeen, Church Road, Pendeen, Penzance, TR19 7SE Cornwall Area: Penwith Hub Area: Pendeen, West Penwith Hub Name: The Centre of Pendeen Opening Times: See activities Activities Offered: Mondays: 10.00 - 12.00 Parent, baby and toddler group, weekly. Contact Charlotte 07469815052 for details. 12.30 - 15.00 Community Hub (free) 'Drop-In' weekly, with refreshments and light lunches provided, scrabble, newspapers and magazines, friendly chat, sewing alterations and up-cycling assistance, occasional IT and Smartphone assistance. There will be more activities at the hub as we go into the Autumn. 18.30 - 20.00 Hatha Flow Yoga, weekly. Contact Rebecca 07907374278 or hello@rebeccayoga.org.uk for details. Tuesdays: 18.00 – 17.30 Gentle Yoga, weekly. Contact Rebecca 07907374278 or hello@rebeccayoga.org.uk for details. Wednesdays: 13.00 - 15.00 Patchwork and Craft session, on alternate weeks. 19.00 - 21.00 Short Mat Bowls. Weekly. Thursdays: 18.30 - 21.00 WI 2nd week of the monthly WI Meetings, members only. 19.30 - 20.30 1st week of the month, Women's Circle. Contact Kelly@wisdomwithin.com Fridays: 10.00 - 11.30 Book Club 3rd Friday in the month 10.00 - 11.00 Get Active exercise class, 1st, 2nd and 4th Fridays. Contact Debbie 07816255405. 11.30 - 14.00 Spinners (of wool) weekly. 16.45 - 16.30 Gardening Club 1st Fridays of the month. Saturdays: 10.00 - 13.00 WI Craft and Produce Fair and cafe, 1st Saturdays of the month. Sundays: 14.00 - 16.30 Pendeen Maids, weekly, making greetings cards for The Centre. Starting in October: Art sessions weekly on Tuesday afternoons from 10th October. IT (free) sessions every Thursday in October, morning sessions 10.30 – 12.30, afternoon sessions 13.30 - 15.30. To book a place contact The Centre on 01736 786776. Public Contact Name: Susan Horner Public Phone: 01736 786776 Public Email: Contact The Centre of Pendeen - to inquire about activities, events, if you are interested in volunteering or need assistance with access or attendance costs. Secretary@centreofpendeen.co.uk Notes: http://www.centreofpendeen.co.uk/activities/ Integrated Care Area: West
properties.title: The Centre of Pendeen

properties.address: Bosavern Community Farm, St Just, Cornwall, TR19 7RD
properties.description: Address: Bosavern Community Farm, St Just, Cornwall, TR19 7RD Cornwall Area: Penwith Hub Area: Hub Name: Bosavern Community Farm Opening Times: Monday - Saturday 10am - 5pm Activities Offered: Activities offered: Free, nutritious vegetarian communal lunch for our full day volunteers Community Growing / Horticulture drop-in taster sessions every Tues & Thurs 10am-3:30pm Chicken Care Tues, Wed, Thurs am / pm Tree planting on Sundays 2pm (Autumn-early Summer) Deliveries on Fridays Occasional workshops and events in permaculture, Cornish hedging, cookery & creative activities (check website & social media for details) Public Contact Name: Katie Kirk & Hugh Taylor Public Phone: 01736 788454 Public Email: info@bosaverncommunityfarm.org.uk Notes: www.bosaverncommunityfarm.org.uk Integrated Care Area: West
properties.title: Bosavern Community Farm
